name: Split Connection (GMTK 2021)
description:
Submission for GMTK Game Jam 2021: Joined Together

Controls:

  • Keyboard: WASD to move, O and P to adjust the connection strength, and R to restart a level
  • Controller*: Joystick to move, Left and Right Bumpers to adjust the connection strength, and Menu Button/Start to restart a level

Tools Used:

  • Unity (Coding), Aseprite (Pixel Art), Krita (Cover Art), LMMS (Music)

All Art, Animation, Music, and almost all code (except for a few things I had to look up) are by me.  https://twitter.com/BoomBox5Plus

*Controllers should work in levels, but not on the Title Screen
